untrustedWorkspaces.description: This extension depends on the vscode.git extension, which is disabled in Restricted Mode.

colors.description: Color to indicate a DVC metric column in the experiments table
Color to indicate a DVC param column in the experiments table
Color used in the experiments table to highlight a value in the workspace that differs from the latest committed value

scm/resourceState/context.when: scmProvider == dvc && scmResourceGroup == changes && scmResourceState != untracked && scmResourceState != notInCache && dvc.commands.available
scmProvider == dvc && scmResourceGroup == changes && scmResourceState != untracked && scmResourceState != deleted && dvc.commands.available

view/item/context.when: view == dvc.views.experimentsTree && dvc.commands.available && dvc.experiments.filter.selected && viewItem == dvcRoot

viewsWelcome.contents:
DVC is currently unavailable, [learn more](https://dvc.org/doc).
[Setup the Workspace](command:dvc.setupWorkspace)

The located version of DVC is incompatible with the extension.
[Find Another](command:dvc.setupWorkspace)
Upgrade DVC then...
[Check Compatibility](command:dvc.checkCLICompatible)

The currently open folder does not contain a DVC project. You can initialize a project which will enable features powered by DVC.
[Initialize Project](command:dvc.init)
To learn more about how to use DVC please read [our docs](https://dvc.org/doc).

walkthroughs.title: Get Started with DVC
walkthroughs.description: Your first steps to set up a DVC project with all the powerful tools and features that the DVC extension has to offer!

steps.title: Install DVC
steps.description:
The DVC extension requires DVC to be installed. To install follow the guide shown on [dvc.org](https://dvc.org).

[Install DVC](https://dvc.org/doc/install)

steps.title: Setup The Workspace
steps.description:
Setup the workspace for the DVC extension.
[Setup The Workspace](command:dvc.setupWorkspace)

steps.title: Output Channel
steps.description:
View the DVC output channel.
[View Output](command:dvc.showOutput)

steps.title: Explore More Resources
steps.description:
Take a look into our [documentation](https://dvc.org/doc) to learn more about DVC. 
[Learn More](https://dvc.org/doc)
